description: Performs one-off resource converge on remote hosts.
name: apply

attributes.description: Load attributes from a JSON file or URL

execute.description: Execute resources supplied in a string

log_level.description: Set the log level (debug, info, warn, error, fatal)

minimal_ohai.description: Only run the bare minimum ohai plugins chef needs to function

recipe_file.description: Path to the recipe file to be executed (relative to a remote host)

timeout.description: Action timeout in seconds. Action will get killed if it doesn't finish in timeout seconds.
